definitions.definition: A classical architectural element consisting of a triangular section or gable found above the horizontal superstructure ( entablature ) which lies immediately upon the columns ; fronton .
A very gently sloping (0.5°-7°) inclined bedrock surface.

main_definition: ( architecture ) A classical architectural element consisting of a triangular section or gable found above the horizontal superstructure ( entablature ) which lies immediately upon the columns ; fronton .
secondary_definitions: ( geology ) A very gently sloping (0.5°-7°) inclined bedrock surface.
